content: attach chart key the contrast colour cc work according to chart a as follows work sts 1-8 a total of 7 8 9 times and finally work sts 9-17 once after finishing chart a row 25 cut cc switch to smaller needles if desired and knit until 2 sts remain on needle 2 k2tog there repeat row 1 and 2 until there are 30 34 are now 33 37 41 sts on needle 1 and 31 38 row in total in the heel flap or to desired 35 39 sts on needle 2 heel flap length and you have just finished row 2 knit one round work the heel turn starting on the ws as work *p1 k3* ribbing for 28 32 36 rounds follows or to desired leg length row 1 ws sl1 p17 p19 p21 p2tog p1 turn heel flap and heel turn row 2 rs sl1 k6 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 purl until 1 st remains before the heel flap is worked back and forth over the gap p2tog p1 turn the 31 35 39 sts on needle 2 starting on the row 4 rs sl1 knit until 1 st remains before ws as follows the gap ssk k1 turn row 1 ws sl1 p2 *k1 p3* repeat * - * to repeat row 3 and 4 until all side stitches the end of the needle turn have been worked and you have just finished row 2 rs sl1 k2 *p1 k3* repeat * - * to row 4 there are now 19 21 23 sts on needle the end of the needle turn 2 priha socks page 2/4 gussets pick up and knit 15 17 19 sts or one stitch per two row of the heel flap along the left edge of the heel flap and one extra stitch between the heel flap and needle 1 place the sts on needle 2 on needle 1 i e instep continue to work the ribbing as established in the leg along the right edge of the heel flap pick up the same number of sts as picked along the left edge place the stitches onto needle 2 and knit to the end of needle 2 on needle 1 continue to work the established ribbing work the gusset decreases on needle 2 as follows round 1 ssk knit until 2 sts remain k2tog round 2 knit chart b chart key repeat rnds 1 and 2 until 31 35 39 sts remain on needle 2 foot continue to work the established ribbing on needle 1 and knit the sts on needle 2 until foot measures a minimum of 10 10 5 11 cm / 3¾ 4 4¼ inches less than the desired final length finally knit one round and m1l at the end of the round there are now 33 37 41 sts on needle 1 and 32 36 40 sts on needle 2 switch to larger needles if desired and attach cc work chart b row
